video.title: The F Word: August 12, 2008
video.description: The New York Times ran a feature August 12, onCivilians who’ve join the Fight in the former Soviet Republic.The story, by NICHOLAS KULISH and MICHAEL SCHWIRTZ is full of empathy and heart.Nika Kharadze and Giorgi Monasalidze went to war last week, the Times report begins… “even though they were not warriors.”It goes on to describe how their parents have been searching for them ever since.
